mapper.select: select seq, name, regdate, total_page from book where seq = #{book_seq}

SELECT seq, book_seq, start_date, end_date, ( SELECT MAX(last_page) FROM book_log WHERE book_seq = #{book_seq} ) AS last_page, COMMENT, finish FROM book_log WHERE book_seq = #{book_seq} ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT A.seq, A.name, A.regdate, A.total_page, (select max(last_page) from book_log where book_seq = A.seq order by start_date desc ) AS LAST_PAGE, ( select finish from book_log where book_seq = A.seq order by start_date desc limit 1 ) AS FINISH FROM book A ORDER BY regdate DESC
select seq, book_seq, start_date, end_date, last_page, comment, finish from book_log where book_seq = #{book_seq} order by start_date desc
mapper.insert: insert into book_log (book_seq, end_date) values(#{book_seq}, now())
mapper.update: update book_log set finish = #{finish}, end_date = now(), last_page = #{last_page}, comment = #{comment} where seq = #{book_seq}
